alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued February 07 at 5:39PM PST until February 11 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Unseasonably hot for February with temperatures from 86 to 91 during Super Bowl week. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, Orange County Coastal Areas and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...Wednesday morning through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The unseasonable heat will increase the potential for heat related illnesses for visitors from other parts of the country where it is very cold.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
